description: IT IS MY DESTINY!  I WILL SERVE HIM BECAUSE OF WHAT HE DID FOR ME AND I WILL DIE FOR MY BELIEFS IN HIM!  I FINALLY EMBRACED WHO I AM 2 YEARS AGO!  I AM A SOLDIER FOR CHRIST! THE DISRESPECT WILL NO LONGER BE TOLERATED HERE SO IF YOU ENJOY MY PAGE, WATCH WHAT YOU SAY OR YOU WILL BE BLOCKED INSTANTLY! I DO NOT MIND DISAGREEMENTS OR OPINIONS BUT WHEN YOU GET DISRESPECTFUL IS WHERE I DRAW THE LINE! TAG ME IN THE COMMENTS WHEN YOU SEE SOMEONE OUT OF LINE SO I CAN GET RID OF THEM! #hollyweirdisevil
